October 7, 2009, Kriss was a client of Clementino’s

Kriss is by far one of the most knowledgeable person's I have ever worked with at Dell when it comes to managing SCM systems and Team Foundation Server in particular. It made my job more challenging but at the same time more interesting because requests coming from his team were always deeper and well thought out as Kriss had already taken care of the questions I would normally get from other customers. I would recommend Kriss to lead any enterprise/global implementation of ALM and SCM solutions.

I have worked with Clare for many years at Texas Instruments, MetaSolv and most recently Dell.  She has been my mentor and manager at various times.  As a mentor she showed me how to advance my career, build my professional networks and reach my full potential.  As a manager she is an inspiring leader that makes a team want to work for her.  She has the ability to pick up new concepts very quickly and the ability to take those concepts and drive projects to completion.  Clare works hard to develop the full potential of her team, help them reach their career goals and makes sure that her team is recognized throughout the organization.  Over the years she has been a very positive influence on both me as a person and my career.
